name.help: Name of the recipe to create

openfor.help: Tag to open the memcached firewall for, if environment is passed it will open for the whole environment

databag.help: The name of the data bag to load the mysql credentials from, not used if the database isn't set

database.help: The name of the database to create

user.help: the user with permissions to the database

password.help: the password for the user, ignored if the databag is set
